column3: Latest;Banteay Meanchey:------ According to a post on social media
column4: a woman was seriously injured by a snake bite and taken by a relative for treatment at Thmor Puok district hospital. The incident happened at 8 am on June 2
column8: Banteay Meanchey Province.------The victim was identified as Yan
column16: the victim had to clear cassava in her farm north of the village about 250 meters away
column17: The snake (unidentified species) was hiding in the grass and bit her right foot. ------POST NEWS------Banteay Meanchey province has some of the ------highest recorded snake bites incidents------ in the country.
